p: The Beles sub-basin is by far the smallest sub-watershed of the Abay. The elevation ranges from 944 m asl up to 2736 m asl over an area of 3526 km 2. It is located at the northern end of the Abay, southwest of Lake Tana. The Beles sub-basin contributes roughly 1.5% (mean contribution, 1989â€“2002) of the total outflow of the Abay River at the lower Abay outflow.
